name: PHVS_NewbornAbnormalConditions_NCHS
title: Newborn Abnormal Conditions (NCHS)
description: The value set contains the list of values used to indicate specific disorders or significant morbidity experienced by the newborn infant.

concept.display: Assisted ventilation required immediately following delivery
Assisted ventilation required for more than six hours
Antibiotics given for suspected neonatal sepsis
Significant birth injury (skeletal fracture(s), peripheral nerve injury, and/or soft tissue/solid organ hemorrhage)
